author: sandersaares
body: Ubuntu 18.04 is almost released but right now there is no way to use PowerShell on it. Please assign top priority to this - I am sure you would not expect it to be normal to not be able to install PowerShell 6 on latest Windows. It should likewise not be normal to be unable to install PowerShell 6 on latest <other supported OS>.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Currently we are working on moving to .Net Core 2.1. After that I hope we resolve this.

title: Support Ubuntu 18.04 on release day
